title: 10 year anniversary plz help Riot
body:
Just got my 10 year anniversary mystery gift but it was only the summoner icon.  I already own Riot Kayle.  Will the skin mystery gift come separately later?

Thanks-
Y4SO

replies.body:
As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, the gifts are still getting sent out. You should see a notification in the client when you receive the mystery gift since you already own Riot Kayle. 

Let me know if you don't have it by the 23rd.

The gifts are being sent to each player separately, so it's normal to receive one before receiving the other. Just hang tight as the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you don't receive all the gifts by then, you can submit a support ticket.
I haven't received the mystery gift or the icon.
Same thing happened to me buddy, I opened a ticket to the support earlier so hopefully one of the riot members can help me out. I hope you get your issue solved
